title: BadImageFormatException when build target is x64
body:
Can anybody explain to me please, why I run into a **BadImageFormatException** when I use latest SkiaSharp from Nuget in a WPF Application that was build with target:_x64_?
Is there any _x86_ dependency inside SkiaSharp?
If the Target is _AnyCpu_ no issue! But unfortunatelly I can not change back to _AnyCpu_!
